page.title: 17Education Bures First School
page.content: On Friday 7th June we went across the county boundary from Essex to Suffolk.We went to Bures school where we interviewed the children. The school is a Victorian building with a caravan classroom.They also have a swimming pool for learners so, during the summer,the children go swimming each day. The school is a first school because it is in Suffolk and the oldest children are only nine. They have to cross the road to the recreation field opposite for sports.Although they have no school hall the classrooms are very big but when they need more space they have to use the village hall.
